title: The Trial of Radiant Order - Aurelius' Sanctuary

available_paths.philosophy: Total commitment to divine light and order
available_paths.description: Fully accept Aurelius' radiance and become a beacon of divine order
Demonstrate mastery over Aurelius' light while maintaining personal will
Work with Aurelius' radiance to create new forms of divine protection

divine_immunity.protection_type: Complete immunity to radiance-based divine decay
divine_immunity.scope: Aurelius' sanctuary and all light-dominant environments

power_increase.mystical_authority: Recognized as divinely approved practitioner with radiance authority

available_choices.mechanical_layers: Players can choose to adopt the defensive and offensive bonuses defined in the core hexagonal system
